description:
The fourth and final match of the ABC Cup’s first round gets underway between Jin and Tetsuya. Meanwhile, Tasuku and Jackknife have an out-of-this-world experience. And Shido is under pressure to find a replacement for Rouga and his powers of darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魂の絆! ドラゴニック・パニッシャー!!
